Package extended_mitre

Class NVDobject

  • java.lang.Object
    • NVDobject
  • public class NVDobject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class' purpose is to connect all methods that put various objects into database so that the needed operation will be executed
    Author:
    Tomas Bozek (XarfNao)

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void extendedDatabase​(java.lang.String cpe_file, java.lang.String[] cve_files, java.lang.String cwe_file, java.lang.String capec_file)
      This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database It uses the extendedDBcore() method for this purpose
      static void extendedDBcore​(java.lang.String cpe_file, java.lang.String[] cve_files, java.util.List<CWEobject> cwe_objs, java.util.List<CAPECobject> capec_objs, java.util.List<CWEextRefObj> external_refs, org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration conf)
      This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database
      static void quickUpdate​(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method's purpose is to quickly update CVE and CPE objects in the database

    • Method Detail

      • extendedDatabase

        public static void extendedDatabase​(java.lang.String cpe_file,
                                    java.lang.String[] cve_files,
                                    java.lang.String cwe_file,
                                    java.lang.String capec_file)
        This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database It uses the extendedDBcore() method for this purpose
        Parameters:
        cpe_file - path to .json file with CPE dictionary data (CPE match feed file)
        cve_files - paths to .json files with CVE objects
        cwe_file - path to .xml file with CWE data
        capec_file - path to .xml file with CAPEC data

      • quickUpdate

        public static void quickUpdate​(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method's purpose is to quickly update CVE and CPE objects in the database
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to .json file with CVE objects - "modified" file containing recently changed data

      • extendedDBcore

        public static void extendedDBcore​(java.lang.String cpe_file,
                                  java.lang.String[] cve_files,
                                  java.util.List<CWEobject> cwe_objs,
                                  java.util.List<CAPECobject> capec_objs,
                                  java.util.List<CWEextRefObj> external_refs,
                                  org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration conf)
        This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database
        Parameters:
        cpe_file - paths to .json file with CPE data (CPE match feed file)
        cve_files - paths to .json files with CVE objects
        cwe_objs - List of parsed CWE objects
        capec_objs - List of parsed CAPEC objects
        external_refs - List of parsed External Reference objects
        conf - object needed to get hibernate configuration
